text: Vano etu mwooneke ittu ikhumelhenlhe vanochukulha inyu thoko Nlhuku chinothanana awe. Vano mwaatti nhokhalha attu o mitheko ni attu o uthuthuwa ni woova, nthananaka ukoona, attu o umindaminda, nnottunana nkhanlhe ni unhiyera Nlhuku ahukumulhe. Mwaatti nhoonechesha wo kila iphiro wiira khannanarilhe, nhorera vachulhu nna nlhove nna.
